data.name: Temporal Sprint
data.detailed_description:
*Please note the gameplay trailer is currently outdated

BEAT THE CLOCK
Temporal Sprint is a 3D platformer with a focus on time manipulation and special abilites, such as Time-Rewinding, Dashing, Fireballs, and Jetpacking. Think on your toes and stay mobile to beat the clock ~ and the kill walls that sweep through the level.


ABUSE THE MAP
Maps are designed with speedrunning in mind, offering many cheeky jumps, dashes, and other things to make a rewarding experience for experienced speedrunners, and clever thinkers who can get off the beaten path. And, with Chaos destruction physics you can bend the map to your will to help you get the best time possible. Destroy bridges, towers, walls, and other structures. The world is your oyster!


CUSTOMIZE. DO IT. I WANT YOU TO.
Frentwick Indie wants to build a reputation for being excellent community listeners, and keep our games free from microtransactions. As such, our store front is built around the community; Youtubers, Streamers, Discord Community Leaders are welcome to email us and put in your cosmetic suggestions.
With this model, we are able to add ENDLESS customization to our game. We want to interact with you.


ONE-TIME PURCHASE MODEL
Bought the game? Great! Thanks for supporting me! You get everything included in the game when you buy it. No microtranactions, no secondary fees. You bought it, you own it.

data.short_description: Temporal Sprint is a 3D platformer game focused on Speedrunning and Time manipulation (such as slow motion and rewinding.)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual-Core Intel or AMD Processor in 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10+ Compatible Card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-Core Intel or AMD processor at 2.8GHz or greater
  • Graphics: DirectX 11+ Compatible Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
